idea:
Vision Earthcare Pvt Ltd is SINE IIT Bombay graduate company that is at the forefront of design, implementation, execution and operations of Nature Based CAMUS-SBT type Waste Water Rejuvenation such as the Pandharpur 2.5MLD CAMUS-SBT Waste Water Recycling System. VEC has implemented more than 150MLD of such projects across India. 

Post COVID recognizing the challenges of designing sustainable habitations Vision Earthcare embarked on promotion of a radical new system called  Peacock Ecocity Model of Urban Development that conceives sustainable communities built around a Perma-Culture forest that is sustained by waste water and bio degradable solid wastes generated by the human community. The Perma-Culture forest also acts as the heat sink and cools down the community by transpiring the treated waste water of the community. The waste water treatment via CAMUS SBT and Solid waste treatment via Vermiculture both leverage VEC's vast experience with Nature Based solutions for circular economy.
name: Vision Earthcare Pvt Ltd

idea: Hoopoe Media is all set to launch an audio streaming service that offers unlimited streaming experience of music, stories and podcast with a user-friendly interface.

idea: The Company was incorporated on 27th August 2020 under the SN Engineering Consultants and Construction Private Limited, The company has access to highly skilled multidisciplinary specialists connected with the Project Management Consultancy, Project Engineering, Construction and Commissioning of Equipment for Refineries, Petrochemical Plants, Steel Plants, Chemical Plants, Power Plants, Solar Thermal Power Plants, PV Solar Power Plants, Agricultural and Fertilizer Plants, Nuclear Plants, Off-shore Oil Drilling Platforms and also Turnkey Solutions in Non-Metallic Piping and Equipment, Manufacturing, Supply and Installation for Seawater Application, Effluent Treatment Plants, and Corrosive Industries.
name: SN ENGINEERING CONSULTANTS AND CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Dr Scrap Waste Management provides end-to-end waste management solutions based on the principles of sustainability and a circular economy, we help organizations, urban and rural collectives,  and companies meet waste management goals.

MISSION - Providing dynamic and effective waste management solutions for organizations, sectors and collectives through sustainability and a circular economy.

VISION- To treat waste generation so as to heal our planet and help create a culture of environmental responsibility in our society

 we believe in "treat waste to treat the earth"
name: DR SCRAP WASTE MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
